message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 7-a-1, translated into all languages

data.en: IRENA validates this indicator for regional, technological, donor, and time aggregations. Any values that are not properly categorised are reviewed at the project level, and manually categorised under the appropriate technology, country, year or instrument type.
data.es:
